message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than $120 to you. To start our negotiation, I am offering the product for $150. I look forward to discussing how this product could benefit you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $150 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
